name: Run Escape
description:
This is a game where you can't stop running and has to use your mind to move things out of your way. 

How to play:

use the space, W, or the up arrow to jump. use the leftShift, S, or the down arrow to crouch.  Use your mouse to move things by using the left mouse button, but you have a limit time to hold it your stamina bar gets to its end . 

(sadly I didn't get to do that yet (ノへ￣、)

This game was for the game jam: Mini Jam #101

not happy how this game jam went but it was fun.

I hope you enjoy!

-blockhead manic
